modName: Replace Main Menu and Loading Screen Fog With Snow
summary: This mod replaces the fog on the main menu and the loading screen with snow.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the fog on the main menu and the loading screen with snow.

The snow will fall from the top of your screen in random patterns.
author: Fenris

files.name: Replace Loading Screen Fog With Snow
files.fileName: Replace Loading Screen Fog With Snow-4624-v1-0.rar
